about_the_game:
Dive into the thrilling world of knight tournaments! Help Hynek compete in jousting, man-to-man combat and archery, as well as to carry out a mysterious quest that will change his life forever.



  • New adventure: Head to Pernstein Castle where knights gathered in 1409 to honor the beauty and virtue of the Lady Madeleine in a tournament. The still rather young Hynek is not only one of the many participants who want to prove their mettle, but is on a secret mission as well.

  • New characters: Meet the treacherous castle lord, William of Pernstein, the renowned warriors John Sokol of Lamberg and John Zizka, as well as many other knights whose names have long since been covered in the dust of ages.

  • Tournament competitions: Test your might in jousting, melee combat, and archery. Discover the strengths and weaknesses of your opponents and turn them to your advantage.

  • Day and night activities: Take part in tournament events during the day and have fun or relax after sunset! You are in for sumptuous feasts, troubadour tunes, chatter around the campfire, and jesters' performances.

content_descriptors.notes: The DLC contains swearing, violence, and alcohol.
